steps.title: Copy
steps.sub_title: Just copy and paste a command from Andronix into Termux.
steps.icon: <svg class="text-white fill-current w-8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M2 5a2 2 0 012-2h12a2 2 0 012 2v10a2 2 0 01-2 2H4a2 2 0 01-2-2V5zm3.293 1.293a1 1 0 011.414 0l3 3a1 1 0 010 1.414l-3 3a1 1 0 01-1.414-1.414L7.586 10 5.293 7.707a1 1 0 010-1.414zM11 12a1 1 0 100 2h3a1 1 0 100-2h-3z" clip-rule="evenodd"/></svg>

steps.title: Configure
steps.sub_title: Wait for the download to complete & setup the distro.

steps.title: Connect
steps.sub_title: Connect any display to the VNC server running on your phone.
steps.icon: <svg class="text-white fill-current w-8" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M3 5a2 2 0 012-2h10a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-2.22l.123.489.804.804A1 1 0 0113 18H7a1 1 0 01-.707-1.707l.804-.804L7.22 15H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V5zm5.771 7H5V5h10v7H8.771z" clip-rule="evenodd"/></svg>

steps.title: Done!
steps.sub_title: Enjoy your distro on any screen you like within your network!
